attributes.action: Step up widespread testing for Covid19 to track the virus to WHO Requirements
attributes.additional_details:
The current stance from our leaders is to self isolate if showing symptoms,they are only testing once people have been taken to hospital.
Isolating whole households for 1 sick family member will be counterproductive unless there is evidence that member has Corona and not a cold.
The frail and Elderly are more at risk using this strategy.Only widespread thorough testing can truly track the spread of this virus,
How else can we ascertain true numbers?
The people need testing when symptoms appear.
attributes.background: We Require our Elected Government to accelerate the testing, tracking and tracing of  coronavirus / Covid-19 cases in the UK.
